problem_text_cn: 如图,半径为5的⊙A中,已知DE=6,∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,则弦BC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙A with a radius of N_0, it is known that DE = N_1, ∠BAC + ∠EAD = N_2, then the length of chord BC is ()
raw_answer:
解:作AH⊥BC于H,作直径CF,连结BF,如图,∵∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,
而∠BAC+∠BAF=180°,∴∠DAE=∠BAF,∴⁀{DE}=⁀{BF},∴DE=BF=6,∵AH⊥BC,∴CH=BH,∵CA=AF,∴AH为△CBF的中位线,∴AH=\frac{1}{2}BF=3．∴BH=√{AB^{2}-AH^{2}}=√{5^{2}-3^{2}}=4,∴BC=2BH=8．
故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理、垂径定理、三角形中位线的性质以及勾股定理．注意掌握辅助线的作法．
